hacks.title: Joy-Starter
hacks.description: Start with the fun part – not the hard one.
hacks.howto: Skip the struggle and begin with a part of the task you’re excited about: 🖊️ The creative bit, 📸 a chill brainstorm, or ✅ something you can finish quickly. When you start with joy, your brain kicks into flow – and pulls the rest with it.

hacks.title: Gentle To-do List
hacks.description: A soft to-do list that speaks to you like your own best friend.
hacks.howto: Write your list like a loving letter: 'Hey darling, here are some things you could try today 💛' Use emojis, colors, and kind words. Avoid the 'YOU MUST NOW'-tone – unless that works for you, then check out the Dark Hacks 💀

hacks.title: Reward Ritual
hacks.howto: Place small rewards after each step: 🥤 Iced coffee, 💃 a dance, 🍪 a snack, 📱 a reel. Make it a celebration – not a punishment!

hacks.title: Aesthetic Workspace Mode
hacks.description: Create a space your brain wants to stay in.
hacks.howto: Build a cozy setup ritual: 🕯️ Light a candle, 🎥 start a 'study with me' video, 🛋️ throw out a blanket, 🎶 play lo-fi. Make your space inviting, and your brain will follow.

extra.placeholder: How will you make your space cozy today?

hacks.title: Visual Victory Wall
hacks.description: Document your wins and build digital confidence
hacks.howto: Create a folder for screenshots, photos, or quotes. Every time you succeed – drop it in there. You’re building your own proof of how awesome you really are 💪

hacks.title: Future-You Letter
hacks.description: Send love to your future self
hacks.howto: Write a short message for tomorrow: 'Thank you for doing it today. You helped us move forward.'

extra.placeholder: Write a message to yourself for tomorrow...

hacks.title: Make It Pleasurable Strategy
hacks.description: Make the process so enjoyable you forget it's 'work'.
hacks.howto: Make your notes pretty, read with snacks, use colors and savor the moment. When work feels like cozy tinkering, it becomes something you actually look forward to.
